website_summaries.verdict: Well-balanced, delicious combination of crunchy almond and chewy coconut in this bar.
pros: A perfect snack for those looking for a tasty, healthy, gluten-free treat
cons: Some find the bars too small to be filling
Can be a bit tough to chew

customer_reviews.title: perfect on the go snack
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these bars! I discovered them when I was pregnant with my second and chasing around a crazy 1.5 year old. As you can imagine I would focus on making sure he was eating and had everything he needed that I'd forgot to pack snacks for myself. I started buying these by the box and load up my purse and diaper bag. I do like that they are healthier than other bars. I don't feel guilty giving some to my son. The almonds are very filling and the honey and coconut gives it the perfect sweet taste. I plan to continue to make these a staple in my diaper bags and purse. I highly recommend these snacks!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these many times in the past. I decided to buy them from Amazon and was disappointed with the quality. This box was stale. My jaw hurt after trying to eat a couple. It could have been a fluke, so I don't hold it against them, but still...
customer_reviews.author: Wolf4

customer_reviews.title: They usually don't like "nutrition" bars- they are hungry and in a hurry
customer_reviews.text: I buy them for kids.They usually don't like "nutrition" bars- they are hungry and in a hurry, they don't like to choke down a grain-type bar that requires a lot of water or liquid to get it down. These bars are great because there's no grain involved. It's just a delightful blend of dried fruit and crunchy toasted almonds- a bit of a tang to balance out the sweetness. Not TOO dry- still moist, chewy, crunchy, and very delicious. This, I look forward to- and in a pinch, it makes a tasty dessert- healthier than lots of other things. Glad to buy them directly from Amazon delivered at home.
customer_reviews.author: Mirsad C.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet, Flavorful and LOTS of Chew
customer_reviews.text: I took two boxes of 12 to my family reunion; thinking I would have a lot to come home with. I came home with three only because I had left three bars in my car to make sure I would have a couple. I do have two Warnings - the first has to do with the chewing power needed to finish one of these bars ... if you have TMJ know you can only eat a half of a bar at one sitting before having to put it down for awhile. Second is - they are very addicting and you may find yourself hiding them from others. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: AncientOne85

customer_reviews.title: Discolored and Hard
customer_reviews.text: I received the bars December 5, 2018. February 21, 2019, not quite 90 days later, the bars are discolored and very hard. Will not but again.
customer_reviews.author: Kd

customer_reviews.title: If you like dark chocolate & almonds, you will like these
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be a perfect pic-me-up while at work. I generally have a breakfast sandwich about 6 am. Sometimes about 10 I get very hungry, with my lunch hour beginning at 1pm, one bar satisfies me until then. I love dark choc & almonds, so these are really great for me. I’ll continue to order them without question of freshness
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May arrive stale and melted
customer_reviews.text: The box I ordered must have gotten hot someplace or was old.. They are sticky and mushy compared to ones I’ve purchased before. They tasted stale and we were VERY disappointed in the quality. Don’t think I’ll ever order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Donnarae Caccavo

customer_reviews.title: A little too sweet
customer_reviews.text: This is another situation where the ingredients sound great (coconut and almond), but the execution and inclusion of glucose syrup makes them incredibly sweet and off putting. The texture is pleasantly chewy, and the packaging is great, but I just can’t get past the sweetness. Maybe that okay for some people, and if you’re into sugary breakfast bars, then this would be great. If you prefer a more natural or subtle sweetness, I’d recommend one of the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Jhakce Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Treat And Mid-Meal Snack For A Good Price
customer_reviews.text: The KIND Almond & Coconut bar is one of my favorite snacks. It is always refreshing and the coconut makes it taste fresh for me. None of the flavors are over-powering and the almonds add a nice crunch to the soft bar. The bars are all natural with 0g cholesterol, low sodium (25 mg), low sugar (12 g) and 3g each of protein and fiber. The 190 calories are a good mid-meal snack and it has become a replacement snack for me. I eat about 5 bars a week and have still not grown tired with this flavor combination. The 1-Star deduction is for the glucose syrup. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Geek

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Old
customer_reviews.text: I was unhappy with the product’s flavor and taste. I eat a ton of these bars, so I know what they should taste like. I feel like the bars have sat in a warehouse and solidified somehow. The bars do not pull a parts easily when you bite into them. They taste old even though the product sell by date is current. I am totally unhappy...yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Product is stale
customer_reviews.text: Product was stale and tasted bad. I ate half and was sick shortly thereafter. The box said use by 19 JUL 2019, BN 18109L42 11:10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling and quick snack
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to for breakfast on the go and road trips. I have done food allergies and sensitivities and also low blood sugar issues (all of which make eating while traveling tricky), and these are a perfect snack... just enough to keep me going and curb hunger.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L LaRocca

customer_reviews.title: Very important review!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised and within expiration date. As advertised. Not sure what else to tell ya!! Yes totally useless. Hope you found it helpful anyway!! How else do you review a common grocery product? Delivery: on time Expiration: good Taste: same as store-bought!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie in NWTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, also quite sweet
customer_reviews.text: Really delicious flavor, but a bit sweet for a snack. I usually end up eating these when I’m looking for “dessert.” I still keep them around though, and will keep buying them. But they’re too sugary for me to use as a stopgap meal replacement. Kind does have other flavors, though, that have less sugar and more protein, and are better for that than this.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L.

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: They did, too, change the taste even though the pack says not. They now have a dangerously chemical taste. I’ll not even give them to the food bank. 🤮
customer_reviews.author: M. Leach

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, tasty, tasty!
customer_reviews.text: My mom introduced me to these when we were golfing. The coconut almond ones are outstanding. I can attest to anything else they make but these little babies were delicious! Great for a snack to travel, perfect for a few bites between the ninth and the 10th hole!!
customer_reviews.author: Bell Halton

customer_reviews.title: Please feed the Amazon workers!
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these for a while, and I love them. Most recently I got two packs. When I opened the box, one pack was sealed as usual, but the other one's flap was open. I opened the flap and someone literally took a bite out of a bar and put it back. While very funny, this is also so unprofessional and disgusting. I gave 3 stars because the bar itself is good, and I have had many good deliveries. I guess whoever ate it wasn't a big fan, since it was only one bite.
customer_reviews.author: James S

customer_reviews.title: Love Kind Bars!
customer_reviews.text: Love Kind bars. I was pleased with the flavor of this coconut and almond one. I’m glad they didn’t add chocolate to it! The Caramel Almond & Sea Salt is my favorite. This is #2!!! Only Kind bars that have been disappointing are the ‘breakfast bars’... more like a thin Rice Krispies bar!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of dark chocolate but love almonds and coconut? Then these are for you!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are just right to give you a bit of energy without too much sweetness. I am not a fan of dark cholate and most bars are coated in dark chocolate these days. I love the taste of the almonds and coconut in this bar. I will always keep these on hand. They go with me every time I head out to golf, walk or go on car trips.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one of my favorite KIND bars in the market right now. The coconut chips are so rich and chunky that it sets this bar apart from the rest. I am a huge fan of these bars!
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie M.

customer_reviews.title: Watch the expiration date
customer_reviews.text: I like these Kind bars. However I ordered a box and they expired a year and a half ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Julie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Got my bars days early! My God, this is my new obsession! 2 of my favorite things combined; can’t go wrong with that! I’ve seen reviews about bars not being fresh. Absolutely no issues with mine!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Seaton

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snack
customer_reviews.text: These bars taste like a candy bar more than a nutritious snack. If you love coconut, these are for you. The flavor is great and works well when you need something quick to eat. I enjoy as a mid-morning treat if I didn't catch breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: BargainBecky

customer_reviews.title: KIND Almond&Coconut Bars taste so good!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bar out there. Only 190 calories for those of you on calorie restriction. Is perfect for me before biking. I can't stand the too-chewy powerbar type of bars, and the rice-crispy type bars are often too sugary-starchy. This bar hits the sweet spot for me. Whole almonds and lots of coconut flakes, without going overboard on the fast burn sugar and rice crispies. And best of all, it tastes really good and clean, not like most of the other bars out there which turns bar-eating into a "job" and an "ordeal" of feeding your body calories for sports/exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Kubota

customer_reviews.title: So good and healthy too!
customer_reviews.text: These taste so good it is hard to stop at one. They are a bit sweeter than I would like but there are big chunks of almonds and they have a strong coconut flavor which I love. They are extremely chewy too so if you have TMJ or pain when chewing I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marqui

customer_reviews.title: Convenient as breakfast substitute
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars and go through a box every week. This is my favorite flavor and they are always so moist and chock full of almonds. Sometimes when I have company for coffe I share a bar. Price is cheaper than I can find them in the store usually
customer_reviews.author: Sudie

customer_reviews.title: TOO STALE TO EAT GAVE ENTIRE BOX TO BIRDS
customer_reviews.text: These were too stale to eat. I opened all of the bar packages and all were the same. Gave to the Birds and Squirrels.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Ray

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: I got to try a sample of these, and liked them so much that had to buy a box of them. This one, the almond and coconut one, is my favorite of the Kind Bars. They are also made with good ingredients and do not have any additives or preservatives. They are made with simple ingredients that taste good. The sugar also is not refined, and is made from a natural, organic source, making these pretty appealing to me. Plus, the price here is much better than buying individually at the store, so I will probably buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Dixon

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE FLAVOR OF KIND BAR
customer_reviews.text: The Almond Coconut bar has always been my favorite, but it is not readily available in stores. I was very happy to find it on Amazon. Thanks for making it available.
customer_reviews.author: JaDe

customer_reviews.title: Significantly Cheaper Here Than at Whole Foods
customer_reviews.text: I saw this pack on the shelf at Whole Foods and bought this pack for a little overr $20. I'm happy I was able to get a replacement pack for cheaper here on Amazon ($14ish). I like having a healthy snack around in case I need a quick pick me up. I have a sweet tooth and this tastes good, but is a healthier option (for me) than a Snickers candy bar. I wish these came in mini sizes, a third the size of a regular bar. Sometimes a regular bar is too big and I hate storing when it's open because it's sticky. (Maybe a Ziplock baggie?)
customer_reviews.author: Empathy

customer_reviews.title: love these for the office
customer_reviews.text: bought these to keep at the office for an afternoon snack - perfect - yummie snack - tried several bars - like the kind the best and these are my favorite
customer_reviews.author: moldie

customer_reviews.title: May be the last time for food purchases.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived 12 this week with the expire date of 6/6/14. One bite said the bars appeared to be out of date fro at least a year. They bars were very dry and chewed like leather. Truly, a new experience for someone that buys this product OTC. The Chocolate ones were the same. It appears, something happened in storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Now KIND has coconut bars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big fan of fruit in these snack bars but the coconut flavor is amazing. It's like an Almond Joy in a healthier package. We enjoy KIND bars as a healthy snack option.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself to something full of flavor and goodness
customer_reviews.text: These are such a treat to have around the house. The flavor of the almonds and coconuts is a great combo and comes off tasting almost like a dessert. Sometimes this is all you need to keep from eating an unhealthy snack!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie D

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh.
customer_reviews.text: Does not taste as good as the one you get from grocery stores. Also tastes like old.
customer_reviews.author: Pransh

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Anyghing with coconut is usually great. I like that they are Gluten-free because now that I'm older it seems that my body doesn't like granola.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this bar and added benefit is it has a low glycemic load. Makes a good alternative for breakfast if in a hurry or a good snack in the afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Scarabin

customer_reviews.title: The best flavored Kind bar
customer_reviews.text: The Almond and Coconut Kind bars are definitely my favorite. Strong coconut and almond flavors. I particularly enjoy these snack bars because they don't have chocolate or added sea salt.
customer_reviews.author: Neil K.

customer_reviews.title: Really good flavor, lighter than chocolate kind bars.
customer_reviews.text: These are really really good when you don’t want a chocolate kind bar. The coconut flavor is really good with the nuts. But you better like coconut if you’re going to get this!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Moore

customer_reviews.title: Taste a bit older than normal
customer_reviews.text: Love these, great to hold you over or for a missed meal. Unfortunately these tasted a bit older, not as fresh. Overall still buy but at store vs here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY!
customer_reviews.text: While most bars are simply convenience foods, this one sets the bar higher. These are YUMMY! Not just a quick at the desk or on the way out the door meal. I actually crave these. The bar is a little bit chewy and goooey, but not too much. Crunchy, but not to hard. The coconut flavor keeps me going back for more. I have hooked other coworkers on these also. Looking forward to including them in a backpacking trip to see how they hold up on the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Vivienne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This product is delicious. Loaded with almonds, my favorite nut and is chewy at at same time. I have bought it a couple of times and will buy again . Low in sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Green

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I will not buy this product again. I love coconut, but this is not one of my favorite bars.
customer_reviews.author: Action/Suspense Fan

customer_reviews.title: Not very flavorful.
customer_reviews.text: I use the Kind bars for a breakfast replacement or for a snack. I like all the flavors except this one. This is too plain tasting for me.
customer_reviews.author: strings

customer_reviews.title: Eat at your own risk and chew carefully
customer_reviews.text: Danger, danger ... yeah they taste great, simple ingredients, etc ... including possibly ROCKS. My wife broke teeth on one of these bars! We were hiking and weren't able to save chewed up bite with offending very hard mystery ingredient. Company refused ANY consideration for dental costs. I'll take some gluten, but less gravel ! You've been warned. Sorry ( Not) Kind... sorry teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: So I started a Gluten-free diet with my husband a few weeks ago. It has definitely helped in trimming our waist-lines as well as in picking up our energy levels. Not so much in finding tasty or non-expensive food. I was looking for a healthy yet flavorful snack that won't break the budget and I decided to try this Kind bar stuff. Boy was I blown away by its freshness and rich flavors. I started with the coconut almond. So yummy and filling. A perfect way to grab a quick bite when you're on the go and without sacrificing health or flavor. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sarrita

customer_reviews.title: Great hearty and healthy taste!
customer_reviews.text: I got this Almond & Coconut 12/pk. They are quite tasty, the ingredients are as stated, so the taste wasn't "engineered" to be flavorful, so no aftertaste. In other words they don't have that good for you vibe. Recently I tried the Luna bars and while they satisfied, they also had a undefinable quality I wasn't crazy about. I would buy these again! Also will try other combos or variety pack.
customer_reviews.author: Carola L.

customer_reviews.title: Coconut, Coconut Whose Got The Coconut!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I'm a nut freak who can't make up her mind. That's why I had to buy three different boxes of KIND. The Almond & Coconut is low glycemic meaning there slowly digested, and won't spike your glucose (sugar) level. If you love coconut "and I do" then you will love this chewy bar. I eat them for breakfast, lunch, or a snack.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: We tried 3 types of Kind bars and liked this one the best. If you like coconut and nuts, you'll like it, and it seems like a healthier snack option than many.
customer_reviews.author: MM.

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy snack!
customer_reviews.text: I love almond and coconut together and these do not disappoint. They would be a 5 star if they had some chocolate! Perfect for a healthier snack option.
customer_reviews.author: godchaser18

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite but they can get pricey at the grocery. This was a good value as a bulk buy.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, and great value to get so many in a box. If you love coconut, want to satisfy a little sweet tooth but don't want to eat something horrible for you - try these.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Low calories great taste
customer_reviews.text: I tried different bars of other brands but, in my opinion, these are the best in terms of taste and low calories. I usually one of them in the morning, with a cup of coffee, I love it. I love their taste and they fill me up. If you are looking for a snack but you are following a diet this could be a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: KIND
customer_reviews.text: Our whole foods diet makes eating tricky sometimes, so when I saw KIND bars in the supermarket I was really excited. Our tastebuds are used to nearly no sugar, no salt and absolutely no preservatives or additives so these bars hit the spot. The coconut and almond bars were chewy and crunchy with just a hint of sweetness and they were filling. One bar and I was ready to go for the morning! Mr. MVP had one KIND bar and a yogurt and a piece of fruit and he was on his way. Our supermarket had them for $1.50 per bar so $1.20 per bar is a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: NVanPutt

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and gooey goodness!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this item I had presumptions of a flavorless bar with the texture and consistency of dry rice cake. All you healthy diet conscious people know what I'm talking about! Boy, was I wrong. This bar is suprisingly succulent and delicious. It is great for a keto diet since it contains alot of fat. I will be regularly purchasing this for my daily once a day treat from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Thai

customer_reviews.title: Super Sweet
customer_reviews.text: I love Kind snack bars, however, found these to be far too sweet, and I do love my sweets. Could not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite bars
customer_reviews.text: This flavor kind bar is so delicious it never lasted long in my house when I receive it. It’s just those sweet coconut🥥 taste with the almonds that makes it so great. Just wish they wasn’t so expensive and they could go a little less on the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johns

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying these at work for almost two dollars each. They became an addiction. Great taste and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Best KIND flavor EVER!
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect mix of almond crunch and light coconut sweetness. I wish it had a little more protein (only 3g), but the 12g sugar is tolerable with a potassium bonus. The flavor is outstanding! These travel easily in varying temperatures and don't leave a crumby mess. I easily go through 1-2 boxes a month.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schottmuller

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite out of all the kind bars! I'm not a big chocolate fan, so I like that these are pretty much just coconut, honey and almonds
customer_reviews.author: RoseyJen

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find this flavor. Prefer it to those with chocolate
customer_reviews.author: V. Lurie

customer_reviews.title: "New look" and new poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved these bars and have been buying them regularly. The most recent order arrived in different packaging with the label "new look". Well no one cares about the box design but these bars have also been altered to have about half the nuts, taste much sweeter, very bland and have slightly fewer calories (180 instead of 190 per bar). The product is VASTLY inferior to the previous product with the same name.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stine

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This flavor is our second favorite. Very yummy, great coconut flavor.
customer_reviews.author: CottonLover

customer_reviews.title: One of my top choices
customer_reviews.text: Flavor and texture are so good. One of my favorite granola bars. Chewy and coconutty.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Good recommendation
customer_reviews.text: I reach what kind of bar could I eat that would not elevate my blood sugar.. this was recommended. It comes in various flavors and the amount of protein keeps you satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: evonne

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Beat Kind Product Line
customer_reviews.text: I am a self-confessed Kind-Bar-Junkie :). I've been using them as mid-morning/mid-afternoon and evening snacks for a number of years now, to help me maintain my hard-won weight loss, and to control my tendency to unhealthy junk foods. I don't think I've met a Kind bar I didn't like. I probably have 25 or 30 of them in my cupboard at this very moment!
customer_reviews.author: A. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Love the coconutty flavor!
customer_reviews.text: So delicious! I'm happy to have found these so I can trade off with my other favorite, Santa Barbara Coconut Almond bars. Kind's bars have a more coconut taste, and Santa Barbara bars have more seeds. Both are chewy and moist, not dry like granola type bars. I love them both and never travel without them. They provide healthy, nutritious snacks for my grandchildren too.
customer_reviews.author: Mamacita

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: I love coconuts and nuts and this bar I lke!😀, I can rarely have just one. I do not like anything with chocolate and I do not find this bar sweet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome seller and product at an awesome price. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: JJOliver

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing, and the price is as well, until you open them and they are SMALL! I took one with me to the grocery store this weekend to compare. While I love your product, I do not love being duped. The price is good because there is less product. This need to be stated clearly on the webpage so people ordering are aware they are not getting what they would get at the grocery store. The only reason I give 2 stars instead of 1 is because they are THAT good....
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Chunky
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty bar. I like the amount of coconut in these. I can see the large flakes .
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K.

customer_reviews.title: Really deserve more stars!
customer_reviews.text: O-M-G...what can I say? These are the absolute best bars I've ever had! They are LOADED with coconut and nuts but, most of all, FLAVOR!!! Gluten free to boot (though that doesn't matter to me), but someone that it does make a difference to...I encourage you to treat yourself to these...chewy, chewy, chewy and so flavorful...did I mention, chewy?!?! The more you chew the more flavor you taste...just the right amount of honey, NOT the bland old sawdust granola bar you may think of...get them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela K.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very good and seem clean and healthy.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. One of my favorites in the Kind selections. Not too sweet...just right for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Hoax not 40 only 12... but they taste great!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful!!! My only complaint is that my order was for 40 and I only got 12. So a bit angry at the hoax of Amazons ad.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: These bars were much harder than the same kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: These bars were much harder than the same kind of Kind bars from the grocery store. We order Kind bars off of Amazon frequently and this was the only batch that has been off in consistency.
customer_reviews.author: slmncsu

customer_reviews.title: Taste just like coconut macaroons!
customer_reviews.text: I first encountered Kind bars at Starbucks, and bought them again because they are pretty filling. I like these because instead of a bunch of chemicals, you get honest-to-goodness ingredients...and these bars make for a quick, wholesome snack. Specifically the Almond and Coconut taste exactly like a coconut macaroon---so good. Suggestion: A variety pack.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B.

customer_reviews.title: I love having these on hand for when I need a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love having these on hand for when I need a quick refuel and don't have time to make a meal. I keep a few in my work bag for when I don't have time to grab an actual luch. Not only to they taste wonderful, I don't feel bad for eating them because it is definatly better for me than the candy bar I may be have grabbed if I didn't have these!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Snack.
customer_reviews.text: These are really tasty, that's a fact. Because they're made of fruit, nuts, and puffed rice, they're also reasonably healthy, making them a reliable snack. I only wish these babies had a bit less sugar, therein allowing me to eat them more often than I currently allow myself to. Of course, I'm sure that would mess up the flavor and make them an entirely different bar, so that's not really a possibility.) Overall, an excellent portable snack, with plenty of healthy fats and deliciousness.
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy & delish!
customer_reviews.text: My husband's favorite-- we Subscribe & Save with a box per month and may even start getting 2 boxes each month. They are healthier than other Kind bars (you know this because my husband eats them-- he's a health and fitness enthusiast!) but they are so delicious at the same time. I usually don't like coconut but it tastes so good and fresh in these bars. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Via S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: So glad to finally find a Kind bar without chocolate! If you like coconut & nuts this is the best. So glad I found these.
customer_reviews.author: Domvaz

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other health bars, Kind bars taste good and have all natural ingredients. They also contain protein and fiber, which stave off hunger, and I feel full and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A tasty treat.
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy eating coconut, almonds, and chocolate, this bar is the one! A tasty treat that's quite satisfying. Kind Bars are more pricey in the market, best deal so far on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MMart

customer_reviews.title: Gluten/dairy free for the win
customer_reviews.text: Love kind bars. One of the few glutwn/dairy free bars made that taste good
customer_reviews.author: JDM Bird

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Coconut goodness!!!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are the prefect balance of sweet and dash of salty! Great for throwing in backpack for a hike, or your purse while running errands!
customer_reviews.author: ronniegofish

customer_reviews.title: Tooth crackin' good !
customer_reviews.text: I eat one of these almost every day, and at night when I need a snack. One trick that I found to keep them from being really soft and gooey ,(we spend 6 months in Key West where it gets really hot), I keep them in the freezer. If you don't have 50 crowns in your mouth or loose teeth , this works great and they're a lot less hassle to eat.
customer_reviews.author: riggarob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. Much, much healthier than candy bars. The problem is just eating one. I almost decided to come back and lower my rating on these to 1 or 2 stars jst to make sure they are ALWAYS available for ME to order. I love them that much. But I don't think anybody else would.....they are horrible tasting and bad for you. Stay away!! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I love these they are the only flavor I buy
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Chapman

customer_reviews.title: So Good and Handy
customer_reviews.text: Just love these. Keep them in the car in your purse, kids backpack. So handy.
customer_reviews.author: christine clarke

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how anybody could find these tasteful, I had to wash my mouth out with soap after the first bite.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: A friend described them as an Almond Joy bar but without the chocolate. If you like coconut, you will love this bar.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: Best price on these delicious bars, love love to eat them, hope it is less calories that I normally eat.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Tindel

customer_reviews.title: Oh spend $ on this
customer_reviews.text: You will not be sorry you buy these. It especially helps if u really like coconut!
customer_reviews.author: kay stevens

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Yummy! A great alternative to an Almond Joy. Lots of almonds and coconut.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn

customer_reviews.title: Addicting!
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little high priced, but bet you can't eat just one!
customer_reviews.author: Spider

customer_reviews.title: Like chewed chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is awful, like chewing chemicals. The nut & caramel ones are great, not these
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little plain tasting
customer_reviews.text: Good but a little plain tasting. I was hoping for more flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Stale Kind Bars
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I absolutely love Kind bars! I was surprised when I saw them on Amazon, but thought I should give them a try. They were definitely shipped in a timely manner. I ordered a box for my sister, who has Celiac disease (cannot digest gluten), and hers were shipped promptly as well. The problem is that the Kind bars were stale! They were hard and not pleasant to eat. I called my sister and she had the same issue. I buy them all the time at my local grocery store and have never run into this problem. Therefore, I will not be ordering them or any other food items from Amazon again. "Kind"ly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Tisdall

customer_reviews.title: Love this bar.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Kind bars, especially the coconut and dark chocolate with almonds. Surprising, my teenage son does too. I keep them in my satchel, nightstand and office desk. I find them really filling and they take the edge off my worst snacking instincts. I feel sorry for people who can't eat them because of nut allergies. 🙃
customer_reviews.author: MaherIsALoser

customer_reviews.title: Very nutty and tasty
customer_reviews.text: Like other varieties of Kind bars these are very tasty and satisfying. Almond and coconut are a very good combination, although due to my teeth I will probably stay away from nuts in future.
customer_reviews.author: britty

customer_reviews.title: Um! Um! Good!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are very tasty especially if you like coconut and crunch. Problem is I got them to take to work but I eat them up before I get there! I wish they were a little cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: jdsutt47

product_meta.title: KIND Bars, Almond & Coconut, Gluten Free, 1.4oz, 12 Count
product_meta.description: Size:12 Count (Pack of 1)These bars are where our journey started and it was simple: whole ingredients like nuts, mixed with fruits and spices bound together with honey. One of our original and best-selling bars: made with almonds and pieces of toasted coconut bound together with honey for a sweet, chewy, crunchy snack. Tried and tested by taste buds everywhere. Contains 12g of fat per bar. See nutrition panel for saturated fat content. Made in facility that processes peanuts, tree nuts, soy and sesame seeds. Gluten Free No Genetically Engineered Ingredients Low Glycemic Index Dairy Free Very Low Sodium 0 g Trans Fat Kosher
feature_bullets: One of our original and best-selling bars: made with almonds and pieces of toasted coconut bound together with honey for a sweet, chewy, crunchy snack.
A satisfying, nutty snack that only seems indulgent.
Gluten free, No Genetically Modified Ingredients, 0g Trans Fat, Kosher
Low glycemic index, low sodium, good source of fiber

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
